events.message: The customer reported an auto accident involving their sedan colliding with a tree at the intersection on April 30th.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and notes provided by the customer.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle this auto accident claim to ensure smooth communication and processing.
The insurance company sent an official acknowledgment to the customer confirming receipt of the auto accident claim.
Additional documents requested include the police report and photos of the damaged vehicle to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including the police report and multiple photos of the car damage.
The investigation team started reviewing the submitted evidence and contacting witnesses to verify accident circumstances.
Investigation completed confirming the collision details and the liability status based on the evidence provided.
A settlement amount was proposed to the customer covering the repair costs and rental vehicle reimbursement.
The customer provided positive feedback, expressing satisfaction with the prompt settlement offer and communication.
The claim was officially approved by the insurance company after the customer agreed to the proposed settlement terms.
The approved settlement payment was issued to the customerâ€™s bank account covering all repair and rental expenses.
The auto accident claim was closed successfully following payment issuance and confirmation of customer satisfaction.
